channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Storm Threat Moves South Toward Virginia
item.description: Lingering showers were forecast for the New York City area, but heavy rain and threats of flash flooding were shifting south on Tuesday.

item.title: The attacks on Tim Cook are half-baked—despite Apple stumbling over AI
item.description: Under Tim Cook's leadership, Apple’s market value has soared from $350 billion in 2011 to more than $3 trillion today.

item.title: Coding has emerged as genAI’s killer use case. But what if its benefits are a mirage?
item.description: New research shows that coders vastly overestimated how much more efficient they were with AI help.

item.title: For Some Republicans, Trump’s Shift on Epstein Is Just the Latest Breach
item.description: Right-wing Republicans have also criticized the president’s stances on Iran and Ukraine, hinting at a broader fraying of his political coalition.

item.title: Real estate mogul Barbara Corcoran shares the ‘crazy’ work perks she’s offered her team including a free Bentley, elephant rides, and ‘the wildest parties in town’
item.description: While other CEOs try to create the best business results with RTO mandates and mass layoffs, the 'Shark Tank' mogul’s "crazy" perks created loyalty th...

item.title: Inflation concerns trigger a market dip as new data shows impact of Trump tariffs in June
item.description: President Trump's trade war is beginning to impact the consumer price index.

item.title: Mamdani for Mayor (if You Want a Foil for Republicans)
item.description: Get ready for the G.O.P. to run against “Mamdani Democrats” for several election cycles to come.

item.title: Democrats Broach Potential Walkout to Block Texas Redistricting
item.description: Hakeem Jeffries, the House Democratic leader, told Texas Democrats on a call on Tuesday that the moment required everyone to take extraordinary action...

item.title: Men Who Cut Down Beloved Tree in England Get More Than 4 Years in Prison
item.description: The tree, a landmark that stood by Hadrian’s Wall in northern England, was found illegally cut down in 2023.

item.title: Americans spend $40 billion on their pets’ health care. Chewy has a plan to get more of their money
item.description: Americans adopted roughly 23 million pets during the pandemic, and Bank of America Research sees the "COVID cohort" nearing middle age.

item.title: Police Arrest Far-Right Leader After Anti-Immigrant Riots in Spanish Town
item.description: Prosecutors said the local head of Deport Them Now, an anti-immigrant group, helped incite four days of violence that have rattled a town with a large...

item.title: Wednesday Briefing: China’s Economy Grows Despite Tariffs
item.description: Plus, “Severance” picks up top Emmy nominations.

item.title: Men Who Cut Down Beloved Tree in England Get More Than 4 Years in Prison
item.description: The tree, a landmark that stood by Hadrian’s Wall in northern England, was found illegally cut down in 2023.

item.title: Ukraine Will Get U.S. Weapons in a New Way. Here’s What We Know.
item.description: NATO allies will buy arms, then give them to Ukraine, President Trump said.

item.title: Republicans in Congress Shift to Backing Ukraine, Matching Trump’s Reversal
item.description: After years pressing to end U.S. aid to Ukraine, many Republicans have abandoned that position now that President Trump is supporting the country agai...
